markdownRemark.html: Harsha is a lawyer by training. At CDL, he works on projects under the Law and Justice vertical. He is passionate about using data in legal research, evidence-based policy making and inter-disciplinary research. His research interests include public laws, human rights, politics, development, public policy and governance. In free time, he enjoys watching cricket, sit coms and political dramas.

frontmatter.name: Sri Harsha Kandukuri
frontmatter.quote: Aano bhadra krtavo yantu vishwatah - Let noble thoughts come to us from all directions - Rig Veda
